description:
Positioned in the heart of Fitzgibbon, this gem of is a terrace style home is ready for its newest owners. Set out with 139sqm of liveable space, this property offers low maintenance living, all while having everything you need at the touch of your fingertips.

Starting out on the ground floor, entering through the patio, you are greeted with the open plan living and dining areas, perfect for the modern family or social butterfly. The sleek tiled floors in the downstairs area make for easy maintenance, all while still creating a homey feel.

Flowing from the dining is the humble yet practical kitchen laid out for ease of use. The modest kitchen, fitted with stainless steel dishwasher and gas cooktop allow for high quality living, without the high level of effort. The tidy front courtyard allows for that touch of nature or alfresco dining, whilst the back is the perfect location for the family BBQ or additional storage.

The second floor is all about relaxation. Boasting two spacious, carpeted bedrooms, both fitted with ceiling fans, their own ensuites and built-in robes. The large bedrooms allow for freedom, comfort, and practicality. Both bathrooms are designed to be easy to maintain, styled with a sleek modern design and spacious for the user. The north facing bedroom boasts a beautiful natural light through the large windows, where the south facing bedroom enjoys its own balcony and additional air-conditioning unit to stay cool in those warmer months.

Relax after a long day at home, kick back in the living room for family movie night or simply unwind in the comfort of your own bedroom. Create the dream home for you and the family or add to your investment portfolio in the rapidly expanding area of Fitzgibbon. Don't wait – this beautiful home could be yours!


Highlights of the property includes

- Two well-sized bedrooms with carpet, built-in wardrobes, ceiling fans with additional air conditioning unit in the main bedroom
- Dual ensuites with ample storage and separate toilet
- Functional and modern kitchen with gas cooktop, dishwasher, stainless steel sink and ample storage space
- Open-plan living and dining area with tiled flooring, ceiling fan and air-conditioning
- Internal laundry and additional toilet downstairs
- Security screens and blinds throughout
- Single lock-up carport
- Large back patio area and tidy front courtyard
- Freehold title and no body corporate fees

Perfectly positioned, close to:
- Local Shopping Centre (1.9km)
- Taigum State Primary (2.8km)
- Carseldine Train Station (700m)
- Aspley State High School (3.6km)
- Westfield Chermside (5.5km)

Facts
Rates – approximately $450 Per Quarter
Utilities – approximately 250$ Per Quarter
Current rental appraised at $ - $ Per Week


This home has been lovingly maintained and is child and pet friendly. There are many lifestyle features not mentioned above which all add to its functionality and liveability. This home is perfect to either raise your family, watch the area grow, reap the rental return, or simply enjoy life in the suburbs. Don't miss this opportunity to secure this home in this superb location.
Contact Sam Tahana on 0400 047 129 or Jordan Baldan-Vine on 0468 544 264 today.
